Mailing Address: c/o CANGRANDS National Kinship SupportFoster AveBelleville, ON     K8N 3R4
Service Details: - Assists grandparents raising grandchildren by providing online, practical and emotional support and information- Offers online access to a private support internet group and private peer support chat room- Members are invited to special grandparent events- Offers telephone support to members in crisis- Hosts annual summer camp and cookout for members
